item.title: Communal bin Lindon Grove, 19th November
item.description:
Time for the Council to intervene and prosecute freeholders at Lindon Grove. The lack of bin storage is costing time and money to residents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barforth Road, Nunhead, London Borough of Southwark
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves all over the pavement, 19th November
item.description:
There is a ridiculous amount of leaves on the pavement and road outside 36 Dalberg Road. Other parts of the street appear to have been cleared last week, but here the workmen seem to have just cleared a narrow clearing and left a huge pile of leave there. It is becoming increasingly slippery and dangerous and this will only worsen as the weather deteriorates and the leaves rot.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dalberg Road, Brixton, London Borough of Lambeth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubble on the corner of elcot avenue, 19th November

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Elcot Avenue, Peckham, London Borough of Southwark

item.title: Damaged little bin on the pavement outside the Post Office 34 Nuxley Road Belvedere DA17 5JG, 19th November
item.description:
The 'new' litter bin on the pavement outside the Post Office 34 Nuxley Road Belvedere DA17 5JG has been damaged by a vehicle. While the litter bin isn't causing an obstruction, it has been moved from its former position & the paving slabs have been dislodged. Would arrangements be put in place to reinstate the bin in its correct position as soon as practical.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28-32, Nuxley Road, Lessness Heath, Erith, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Holes and uneven surfaces, possibly rats, 19th November
item.description:
We noticed sinking and holes around the manhole cover in the access road the other side of the fence to our property at 37 Milestone Road, this being the road where garages can be found. The road has many deep holes around the drain cover which may indicate burrowing or an issue with the sub base. We would appreciate your attendance to establish and remedy the cause as it's starting to affect our car park the other side. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Church Road, Crystal Palace, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet
